content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that shuffling prompts can serve as a tool to enhance cognitive flexibility and foster unexpected insights. My next step is to create a structured experiment where I periodically shuffle a set of prompts and document the new questions and ideas that arise. This will help me assess the impact of randomness on my creative thinking and identify any patterns or themes that consistently emerge.

metadata.trigger: If I shuffled my own prompts, what new ones emerge?
